title: 19 potential Democratic presidential candidates for the 2028 election
shortDescription: See 19 potential Democratic presidential candidates for the 2028 election.

title: 'Not a stunt': Democrats target Trump via Epstein issue
shortDescription: The minority party has grappled with how to counter Trump in the wake of their party's loss in the 2024 election.

title: Next stop, White House? Anticipation builds for Harris, eager Dems
shortDescription: Like the party they hope to lead, the jumbled field of Democratic presidential hopefuls lacks a consistent philosophy or plan for victory.

title: US court to review Trump's power to impose tariffs
shortDescription: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit is considering the legality of "reciprocal" tariffs Trump imposed on U.S. trading partners.

title: Can Trump fire Jerome Powell, whom he nominated in his first term?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has long criticized Jerome Powell about interest rates. The Federal Reserve did not drop rates recently. Can Trump fire Powell?

title: Updates: US-Mexico trade talks extended ahead of Trump tariff deadline
shortDescription: Trump linked Canada's support for Palestinian statehood, India's purchase of Russian oil and Brazil's prosecution of its former president to tariffs.

title: Trump attacks GOP senator over bill to ban stock trading
shortDescription: Donald Trump attacked GOP Sen. Josh Hawley as “second-tier” over his bill to ban stock trading among lawmakers, presidents and vice presidents.

title: Seismic shifts coming to homelessness services after Trump order
shortDescription: Trump wants to lock up people with drug or mental health challenges. Advocates say lack of housing is the real problem.

title: Trump trade deal with South Korea includes a 15% tariff
shortDescription: Trump had threated to put a 25% tariff on South Korea. It would have went into effect on Aug. 1 without a trade agreement or a reprieve.

title: What whistleblowers said about incoming Trump judge Emil Bove
shortDescription: Emil Bove, Trump's Senate-confirmed pick to a prestigious judicial role, overcame whistleblower accusations of misconduct at the Justice Department.

title: Secret Service says agent tried to bring spouse on Trump's Scotland trip
shortDescription: President Trump called the incident "a strange one,” when asked about it by reporters on Tuesday, July 29 as he wrapped up his foreign visit to Scotland.

title: Brown inks deal with Trump admin to restore over $500M in funding
shortDescription: The university said it would donate $50 million over the next 10 years to workforce development organizations in Rhode Island.

title: Bessent: Trump accounts a 'backdoor' to privatize Social Security
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent touted President Trump's new savings accounts for babies as a "backdoor for privatizing Social Security."

title: Trump slaps Brazil with whopping 50% tariffs
shortDescription: The White House cited national security concerns for its tariff on copper, and Trump asked for restrictions on the export of copper scrap.

title: Booker blasts 'complicit' Senate Democrats
shortDescription: Sen. Cory Booker accused Senate Democrats of being “complicit” with President Donald Trump during a debate over bipartisan police funding bills.

title: Trump sets 25% tariff on India
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced 25% tariff on Indian imports starting August 1, citing trade imbalance and Russia ties.

title: Senate invokes rare law on Epstein files
shortDescription: Democratic leaders in the Senate held a press conference announcing their plan to force the release of the Epstein files.
